title: Eco-friendly Store Terrace Opens in Hornell, Offering Sustainable Home Goods and Plants
originSummary: Terrace New York is a newly established eco-friendly store in Hornell, offering a range of home goods, personal care products, and plants.
The store is committed to sustainability and community, with products made in-house and a focus on sustainable practices.
Terrace also plans to establish a recycling program and develop a farmland to grow raw ingredients for their products.
commentSummary: Terrace New York is a newly established eco-friendly store in Hornell that sells home goods, personal care items, and plants.
The store produces and sells various products, including candles, room mists, hand sanitizers, body oils, and bath scrubs, all made in-house.
They also offer tropical plants imported from Ecuador and Indonesia and prioritize sustainable practices.
Terrace New York is committed to sustainability and community, with plans to establish a recycling program.
The store is hosting a grand opening celebration on November 17.
They have future plans to develop a 25-acre farmland near Hornell to cultivate raw ingredients for their products.

title: VIP Outlet Revamps User Experience to Enhance Purchasing Process
originSummary: VIP Outlet, the largest curator of retail returns in North America, has relaunched its brand and website to improve the user experience.
The ecommerce marketplace offers deals on new, overstock, open-box, and refurbished products from popular brands, with savings of up to 75% compared to retail prices.
VIP Outlet has gained nearly two million new users in the past year and appeals to Gen Z and Millennials with its sustainable second-hand marketplace.
commentSummary: VIP Outlet, the biggest curator of retail returns in North America, has relaunched its brand and website to improve user experience.
The ecommerce marketplace offers deals on new, overstock, open-box, and refurbished products from popular brands, with savings of up to 75% compared to retail prices.
VIP Outlet has gained nearly two million new users in the past year and appeals to Gen Z and Millennials by providing a sustainable second-hand marketplace.

title: Mother in Cardiff Saves £1,000 on Christmas Shopping by Buying Second-Hand
originSummary: A mother in Cardiff saved £1,000 on Christmas shopping by purchasing everything second-hand.
Jess Potter and her partner operate a pre-loved marketplace platform and have made second-hand Christmas a tradition.
They found high-quality gifts and home items at a fraction of the original cost, including a £400 gold chain necklace for £50 on eBay.
Jess highlights that second-hand shopping is environmentally friendly and allows for more thoughtful gift-giving.
She offers tips for finding great second-hand items, such as planning ahead and exploring various platforms like charity shops, Facebook Marketplace, and Etsy.
commentSummary: A mother in Cardiff saved £1,000 on Christmas shopping by purchasing second-hand items.
Jess Potter and her partner run a pre-loved marketplace platform and make it a tradition to have a fully second-hand Christmas.
They find high-quality gifts and home items at a fraction of the original cost, emphasizing the environmental benefits and the fun and thoughtful aspect of second-hand shopping.

title: Brazilian Fintech QI Tech Raises $200M in Series B Round for Expansion and M&A; Other LatAm Startups Secure Funding
originSummary: Brazilian fintech QI Tech has raised $200 million in a Series B round led by General Atlantic to expand its operations and consider mergers and acquisitions.
QI Tech offers simplified loan processes and decentralized credit access.

Other fintech companies in Latin America, including Finkargo, Verqor, Axify, VAAS, Endeavor, Fracttal, Vopero, and Enerlink, have also secured funding for their expansion and growth in different sectors.
commentSummary: Brazilian fintech QI Tech has secured $200 million in a Series B funding round led by General Atlantic to support its expansion and explore potential mergers and acquisitions.
QI Tech simplifies the loan process and offers decentralized credit access, aiming to make financial services more accessible.

Other Latin American fintechs, including Finkargo and Verqor from Mexico, as well as Axify, VAAS, Endeavor, Fracttal, Vopero, and Enerlink, have also raised funding for their growth and expansion in various sectors.

title: How to Secure Resale Tickets for Taylor Swift's Eras Tour in Australia
originSummary: Taylor Swift's Eras Tour in Australia sold out quickly, disappointing many fans.
Official resale of tickets is scheduled to begin on November 24 through the Ticketek Marketplace.
Additional tickets with obstructed side-views will be released at a lower price of $79.90.
commentSummary: Taylor Swift's Eras Tour in Australia sold out quickly, disappointing many fans.
The official resale of tickets will begin on November 24 on the Ticketek Marketplace.
Additional tickets with obstructed side-views will be released at a lower price of $79.90.
It is recommended to purchase tickets only from official sources to avoid scams and cancellations.
There is a chance that more tickets may be released closer to the event.
International tour dates are also available for fans willing to travel.

title: The RealReal (REAL) Stock Jumps on Strong Q3 Results and Positive Adjusted EBITDA Guidance
originSummary: The RealReal (REAL) saw a 6.7% increase in pre-market trading after reporting higher-than-expected Q3 results, fueled by higher Average Order Values.
Although revenue guidance for the next quarter fell short of estimates, the company raised its Adjusted EBITDA, indicating a potentially more profitable business.
While the stock has been volatile in the past year, it is currently up 74.3% since the start of 2023, despite still trading 34% below its 52-week high.
commentSummary: The RealReal, a luxury marketplace, saw a 6.7% rise in pre-market trading following its better-than-expected third quarter results, driven by higher Average Order Values.
While revenue guidance for the next quarter fell short of estimates, the company raised its Adjusted EBITDA, indicating a more profitable business.
Despite the increase in stock, The RealReal is still trading 34% below its 52-week high, but has seen a significant increase of 74.3% since the beginning of 2023.

title: How to Secure Final and Resale Tickets for Taylor Swift's Australian Tour
originSummary: Organizers of Taylor Swift's Australian Eras tour are releasing one last round of tickets for fans who missed out on the initial sale.
The tickets will be limited and include partially-obstructed side view seats.
Resale tickets will also be available for purchase on November 24 through Ticketek's official resale platform, Marketplace.
commentSummary: Organizers of Taylor Swift's Australian Eras tour are releasing a limited quantity of additional tickets for fans who missed out on the initial sale.
These tickets will include partially-obstructed side view seats.
Resale tickets will also be available for purchase on November 24 through Ticketek's official resale platform, Marketplace.

title: New Tickets Released for Taylor Swift's Aussie Eras Tour with Secure Resale Marketplace
originSummary: Additional tickets for Taylor Swift's Australian Eras Tour have been made available due to high demand.
The new tickets include partially-obstructed side view seats and can be purchased on the Ticketek website.

Ticketek has created a secure secondary market called Ticketek Marketplace for fans to buy and sell tickets, with resales capped at a maximum of 10% above the original purchase cost to prevent scalping. Unauthorized platforms for reselling tickets may result in ticket cancellation and refusal of entry to the venue.
commentSummary: New tickets for Taylor Swift's Australian Eras Tour are now available for purchase due to high demand.
The tickets include partially-obstructed side view seats and can be bought on the Ticketek website.

Ticketek has also launched a secure secondary market called Ticketek Marketplace for fans to buy and sell tickets, with resale prices capped at a maximum of 10% above the original purchase cost to prevent scalping.

title: Twice as Many Used Electric Cars Sold in UK Compared to Last Year
originSummary: The UK has seen a doubling in sales of used electric cars compared to the previous year, with 34,021 pure battery electric cars sold between July and September.
The increase in sales can be attributed to an expansion in the supply of electric cars.
Overall, used car sales increased by 5.5% year-on-year.
The Society of Motor Manufacturers and Traders (SMMT) emphasized the importance of both the new car market and the development of charging infrastructure to sustain this growth.
commentSummary: Sales of used electric cars in the UK have doubled compared to the previous year, reaching 34,021 pure battery electric cars sold between July and September.
The increase in sales is due to a higher supply of electric cars in the market.
Overall used car sales have also increased by 5.5% year-on-year.
The Society of Motor Manufacturers and Traders (SMMT) emphasized the significance of a robust new car market and the importance of developing charging infrastructure to sustain this growth.
